entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries changing to 30 percent chance of flurries near midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries changing to 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the morning. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 3.
